thread.title_full: Lions at Seahawks game score: Live blog, inactives, updates, highlights

author: Sean Wagner-McGough
title: Lions at Seahawks game score: Live blog, inactives, updates, highlights
text:
41m ago â€¢ 1 min read 
The Lions and Seahawks aren't kicking off the playoffs on a roll. The Lions were 9-4 once and appeared to be headed to the NFC North title. But a three-game skid and the Packers' late run relegated them to the sixth-seed in the NFC. The Seahawks -- 3-3 in their past six -- are vulnerable, but haven't lost a home playoff game since January 2005, winning their past nine in Seattle. 
Follow along below for instant analysis, player news, injury updates, scores, highlights and reaction. 
If the live blog below is not loading properly for you, please click here to view it.
